interfork_optimizations.highlight: Cell-level deltas implementation progress: Lighthouse nearly done, Prism in review, Lodestar debugging
Blob DevNet Zero running stable for 2 weeks; collecting metrics on partial messages
Cell-level deltas can deploy pre-Amsterdam; backwards compatible with progressive rollout

glamsterdam_epbs.highlight: EPBS DevNet Zero targeted for end of February by multiple clients
New specs release v1.7.0-alpha.2 moves blob KZG commitments to bid structure
Lido researchers found deposit bug; PR 4897 addresses signature verification DOS risk
Fork-choice complexity warning: OptimisticSync with invalid branch removal is highly non-trivial

hegota_headliner.highlight: FOCIL proposed as Hegotá headliner; 8/11 clients have prototypes, currently CFI'd
New headliner proposal: Partial reconstruction and 2D PeerDAS (vertical extension)
Broad consensus on prioritizing censorship resistance for Hegotá fork
Headliner selection deferred to next ACDC to allow review of 2D proposal

action_items.action: Review new metrics PR for cell-level deltas across all CL clients
Review and merge deposit bug fix PR 4897 before DevNet Zero
Review Leo's 2D PeerDAS headliner proposal on Ethereum Magicians

targets.target: End of February 2026 - EPBS DevNet Zero launch
February 19, 2026 - Hegotá headliner selection on next ACDC
